name: Dara Mandle
bio: A New York City native, Dara Mandle graduated from Yale University with a B.A. in English. She worked at such magazines as Talk and Mirabella, then earned her M.F.A. in poetry at Columbia, where she is currently the Assistant Director of the Undergraduate Writing Program. Her poems have appeared in The Brooklyn Review, The New Haven Advocate, and Harpur Palate.
